website_summaries.verdict: You get three whisks for the price of one. These good-quality whisks are also a good deal.
pros: Designed like the OXO Good Grips model at a much lower price
Three sizes to meet your needs
Works like other whisks, but has a very comfortable handle
cons: While these whisks look like the OXO Good Grip and do a reliable job, they are less sturdy than the product they are designed to imitate

customer_reviews.title: Careful with dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: Huh. The description says dishwasher-safe, but the two smaller whisks from this 3-piece set have come apart where the black handle is glued to the metal. For the smallest whisk, that caused all of the metal wires/tines fell out. The mid-sized whisk is still hanging on, but barely. Each time I use it, I have to push the handle back on, but it doesn’t go back on all the way. I love Amazon and have been happy with most AmazonBasics products I’ve purchased, but maybe hand-wash these. I wouldn’t purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: Trish H.

customer_reviews.title: Handle comes off when you wash these in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.text: These work fine, but a big drawback is that you can’t put them in the dishwasher. If you do then the handle comes off, the glue that they used to secure it comes loose at the high temperatures of the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Charles

customer_reviews.title: They are just comfortable to work with
customer_reviews.text: As a Senior age baker for our Senior Center I have found the handle and size of these whisk make my baking time more enjoyable . The shape of the handle seems to put less strain on my hands when I do my mixing. They are just comfortable to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Barb McD

customer_reviews.title: Perhaps I got a bad set, but I would not recommend these based ...
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used the large whisk the handle pulled away from the upper part. Perhaps I got a bad set, but I would not recommend these based on my experience. I would also send them back if I could, but I have discarded the box.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie

customer_reviews.title: so unimpressed ..  cant believe  how inferior this product are
customer_reviews.text: the tines on the whisks seem to break off from the base after a few times of normal use ... normal use as in the beating of three eggs for an scrambled eggs not like we are mixing concrete , pound cake batter or brownies ...WTF... if something is so defective why pan it off on the people .. would suggest not even thinking of buying these poorly made defective pieces of crap
customer_reviews.author: peter hall

customer_reviews.title: Good not great
customer_reviews.text: I love to bake and cook. I loved the price of these whisks, and they work well... but the wires are flimsy. I doubt they will hold up. I do however love that there is the "silicone seal" where the wires meet the handle. Next time, I would purchase a better & more durable set.
customer_reviews.author: Alysse

customer_reviews.title: May not last forever but gets the job done and is comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Ive had this set for several months and thr smallest one broke on me. So that caused me to rate the durability low because I don't know how long the larger ones will last. These are comfortable basic whisks that are cheap so I cant knock the product too much.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for normal everyday use. Not for pros/heavy duty whisking.
customer_reviews.text: Great whisk set for normal everyday use. Probably not sturdy or heavy enough for professional use. Pros: -Sturdy, lightweight construction -Stable wires (they are close together and don't move around too much) -Cheap cost -No rusting as of yet after dishwasher use Cons: -Relatively small handles that could be hard to grip for thicker stirring requirements or cause hand cramping. -May be too light for some heavier-than-average uses
customer_reviews.author: JTS

customer_reviews.title: Hand wash only!!
customer_reviews.text: These are great except I can’t put them in my dishwasher. My dishwasher isn’t even very hot but the glue that holds the handle to the wise portion deteriorated causing the handle to come off. I make sure to hang wash them only, but that’s kind of a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Miller

customer_reviews.title: NOT dishwasher-safe. lots of complaints
customer_reviews.text: handle separared from whisk after it was washed in the dishwasher the 1st time. this product is terrible. lots of other reviewers reported similar problems after washing in a dishwasher. i should have read the reviews...
customer_reviews.author: mq005

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable
customer_reviews.text: These are not durable. The large one broke after one use of stirring waffle batter. The springs came flying out. The others did the same shortly after each use as well.
customer_reviews.author: Randi

customer_reviews.title: ... is small and convenient for small jobs and feels good to the hand
customer_reviews.text: The small one is small and convenient for small jobs and feels good to the hand. The big one is a little flimsy. However it is a good value for every day cook.
customer_reviews.author: Nofuss

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality but One is Defective
customer_reviews.text: These whisks appear to be of good quality and I like the soft handles but the small whisk has an opening between the metal and the handle as if the handle wasn't pushed on tight enough. I tried to push them together but wasn't able. Still usable but not worth the hassle of sending them back. I'll just see how long they last.
customer_reviews.author: Luv My Dogs

customer_reviews.title: Great products for a busy kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I've been using older whisks that have wire wrapped handles. I can't believe it took me this long to buy ones with comfortable handles. We're foodies and I cook a lot so I use these several times a week. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: Bev

customer_reviews.title: NOT Dishwasher Safe
customer_reviews.text: I had these for 1 week, ran them through the dishwasher and the glue holding the handle on dissolved, the handles, all 3 of them, came off and will not go back on. Terrible product.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew A. Reed

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are as nice or nicer than any whisks i've purchased from restaurant suppliers, amazon, or williams-sonoma. Great grips, sturdy constuction, practical sizes. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: tyler

customer_reviews.title: I’m a culinary student and I ordered this to make ...
customer_reviews.text: I’m a culinary student and I ordered this to make a lot of sauces and the handle is not strong to make a big portions of sauces.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: GOOD FOR THE PRICE
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this whisks for a while now & I quite enjoy the durability of them . The only downside is how it easy scratches my mixing bowls.
customer_reviews.author: Jason P.

customer_reviews.title: K whippers
customer_reviews.text: So far great , I know things do fall apart sometimes but I use this almost every day, I love them
customer_reviews.author: K.Villa

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. They look nice and do what they’re supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Great Set at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Great set. Great Price. Comfortable handle. Nice size options. Holes where wires enter the handle are filled/coated so water / food doesn't go in.
customer_reviews.author: Tamar

customer_reviews.title: Not even a one-hit wonder
customer_reviews.text: 1st time we used it one of the wire ends came out. We were beating butter, sugar, and eggs so it should not have been an issue. The handle is really comfortable but we will not repurchase and have returned.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Lasted a little over a year
customer_reviews.text: Price was good and worked fine while it lasted. I was surprised when it fell apart after 16 months. I will be looking for a better one.
customer_reviews.author: K. Graham

customer_reviews.title: as advertised
customer_reviews.text: only problem was a handle came off in the dishwasher. Seem to be held in with stick glue. Was able to reinsert and no issues..
customer_reviews.author: Mike W.

customer_reviews.title: Great set. Comfortable handles
customer_reviews.text: Best whisk set for the price. No complaints. Never knew I needed three sizes, until I got then. They’ve held together well so far. Handles are comfortable when using.
customer_reviews.author: ChrispyC

customer_reviews.title: 2 out of 3 broke
customer_reviews.text: Two of the three came apart where the metal meets the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Wise

customer_reviews.title: Just as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! I bought this for my sister and she uses them everyday!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Wisks Separate from Handles
customer_reviews.text: The Whisks work just great. Until they separate from their handles which only took a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: RecalcitrantRon

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Handles, Strength in wisp are great. Definitely would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: FW

customer_reviews.title: Well made, Perfect array of sizes
customer_reviews.text: Perfect and well made. I use the skinny one so often for marinades etc. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: They are just whisks, but they are better than most.
customer_reviews.text: These whisks work great and seem to be high quality. Hopefully they are durable.
customer_reviews.author: S.C.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. I have run all of them through the dishwasher several times and had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Barrow

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for cooking
customer_reviews.text: Do what they are made for, strong and sturdy, love the 3 sizes
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love how sturdy these whisks are!! Use it everyday, love them!!
customer_reviews.author: ako

customer_reviews.title: Great whisk set
customer_reviews.text: like the quality and good to have a set of whisks. use a lot for various recipes.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with these wisks
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I'm very pleased with this set. They are comfortable to hold and get a good grip. The middle size has a wire that popped out on one end but the rest feel quite sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Holly and Tim

customer_reviews.title: Rubber Peels Off Handle!
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the brand new package, the rubber was peeling away from the handle. I hate to see what will happen after a few times through the dishwasher! No good. Cheap and would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S. Nischan

customer_reviews.title: Not great quality
customer_reviews.text: The handle fell off of the biggest whisk the second time I used it so I glued it back together with gorilla glue and I haven’t had a problem since other than that they work like a whisk should.
customer_reviews.author: ChristyZ

customer_reviews.title: Works great for what it’s needed!
customer_reviews.text: Love the different sizes, although I tend to use the smallest whisk the most. Great value for all three.
customer_reviews.author: Munguia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them. I cook everyday and these work great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: Handle Separation
customer_reviews.text: I'm disappointed that with one or two times in the dishwasher, the handles of these whisks are separating from the whisk itself. It seems these are not meant to last as long as I had hoped they would.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Lampe

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes the handle will slide off but we love they way they wisk
customer_reviews.author: Randon Clayton

customer_reviews.title: but they seem well made and the handles are comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: These are lightweight, but they seem well made and the handles are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Find better whisk.
customer_reviews.text: Trying to find a decent whisk has been an impossible task. These whisk are no exception to the rules. Fall apart just whisking pancake mixes and mashed potatoes.
customer_reviews.author: TKEY

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the price, but do lose form after a few uses
customer_reviews.author: Maya Hutton

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Remember to hand wash and not place in dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Chris arteaga

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made-waste of money
customer_reviews.text: After the second wash in my dishwasher, the black part of the handle completely separated from the metal portion. I would not buy these again, and advise against purchasing it. In this instance, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Muraco

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: These are very low quality. Two of the three handles fell off within the first week of light use. I would not recommend purchasing these items.
customer_reviews.author: Jk

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart after first wash
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to find this set of whisks, but that excitement went away after one use and wash. The smallest one fell apart in the dishwasher. It says it is dishwasher safe, but the handle and whisk part came apart! Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna Totzke

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife who does all the cooking loves these whisks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The handles are uncomfortable!
customer_reviews.text: The whisk seems well constructed. However, the unique shape of the handle actually feels uncomfortable in my hand. It felt awkward holding these whisks with a light grip for quick, rapid whisking (think of holding these like holding a pencil, doesn't work). For heavy-duty whisking where you need a solid overhand or underhand grip, these whisk handles are ideal. That said, the texture of the handle feels nice. If these whisks were made with straight handle instead, I will most likely keep them and use them a lot. Unfortunately, I disliked them the moment I held them in my hand and wanted to return them rather than suffer countless inevitable hand cramps.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Love these... so far they have been durable and love the sizes
customer_reviews.author: Lucky Jo

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good value
customer_reviews.text: Can't complain! I've had them a few months now, used and abused them, and they continue to hold up. Good find for the price.
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect sizes and seems pretty durable. easy to clean to
customer_reviews.author: jacob statler

customer_reviews.title: Not dishwasher safe
customer_reviews.text: These are NOT dishwasher safe. After washing the very first time, the handle came off. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Beth H.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The handles fall off. But we are still able to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Sbul

customer_reviews.title: 2/3 dishwasher survival rate
customer_reviews.text: I never got to use the middle sized whisk because it fell apart in it’s first dishwasher run. The large and small whisks have so far survived multiple dishwasher runs and are great great for beating eggs, batter, what have you.
customer_reviews.author: jw

customer_reviews.title: No the best
customer_reviews.text: I like the product but when I used it broke in pieces
customer_reviews.author: emily

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money going cheap!!!
customer_reviews.text: 1st use the medium size on cane apart. Spend more to get a better quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not durable for regular use
customer_reviews.text: I work in kitchens professionally and these whisks hardly lasted a week. The whisk loosened and fell out, or bent out of shape. They were also shorter than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: A step above my others
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice whisks. The handles are comfortable to hold and the wire structure is nor flimsy like so many I've had. I didn't know I needed better whisks until I have them. These were well worth the cost for the three. I use the largest one most often for beating eggs and mixing crepe batter.
customer_reviews.author: A.Singer

customer_reviews.title: REAL USEFUL BARGAIN
customer_reviews.text: Work well and for us pseudo chefs make quick work of beating stuff up. Been through dishwashings, no probs
customer_reviews.author: DavE

customer_reviews.title: Not dishwasher safe by any means
customer_reviews.text: If you think these are dishwasher-safe I've got a bridge to sell you from New York to London they need to be hand washed only if you have to put the handle back on you got to heat the handle in boiling water it will slip back on but they soon will falls apart right away
customer_reviews.author: John Amel

customer_reviews.title: Good whisks, bad handle rubber.
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift to my Mom, and she is enjoying them. However, the rubber handle covers appear to have all shrunk after machine washing them? They have a gap between the whisk and the rubber handle which exposes a metal rod inside of them. It fortunately doesn't bother my Mom, but it annoyed me a little that they seem to be having problems unpon their very first washing. There was no reason for these to have done this, but I know it is just cosmetic and is not worth sending them back. We've elected to use them until they wear out like anything else, or atleast until the handles fall off... Just doesn't look real nice anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie C.

customer_reviews.title: Separated between metal and rubber when washed in dishwasher.
customer_reviews.text: Separated between metal and rubber when washed in dishwasher. Was going to return, but Amazon credited me and did not require I return them. I do still use them, but the one that separated between the metal and rubber when washed in dishwasher, isn't very nice looking. I am going to try and warm it up again so that the glue will soften and I can slide the two pieces together. If I were to buy another set I would buy OXO instead. Sorry Amazon, nice try though, it really could be a great product if glue or something was improved.
customer_reviews.author: Chris & Sum

customer_reviews.title: Handle came off after second use
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited when these whisks arrived. They were lightweight, the handles were comfortable to hold and use and the there is enough space between the wires to make them easy to clean and prevent rusting. Unfortunately, after the second use of the smallest whisk the black handle separated from the rest of whisk making it unusable. I am very disappointed in the poor quality of the durability of these whisks. Guess I'll need to return the whole set and look for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia Q.

customer_reviews.title: Fell Apart
customer_reviews.text: These whisks fell apart within 4 uses, each. Although dishwasher safe, water always got trapped within the metal housing or possibly inside the black handle - couldn't quite tell, but when I'd go to whisk something, water would leak from the handle after a few seconds - talk about disgusting: dishwasher water in my pumpkin bread and chocolate chip cookies. Splurge and go get the OXO whisks these knockoffs are based off of instead, that's what I'm doing now.
customer_reviews.author: Britt Smith

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: This set was a great idea that didn't work. Two of the 3 items broke within the first 4 months. They whisks separated from the black handles and could not be fixed. My husband is quite handy and even he couldn't repair these whisks. I read the reviews before I purchases these and overall they were pretty good. Amazon may have changed suppliers because the set I got were cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Elsiecurry

customer_reviews.title: ... of this set but this seemed to be a great buy. VERY glad I chose this set - ...
customer_reviews.text: My small whisk had fallen apart so I really NEEDED just the smallest of this set but this seemed to be a great buy. VERY glad I chose this set - easy to use and clean, and nice having three new whisks handy.
customer_reviews.author: S. Post

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than six months
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Cheap. Lasted less than 6 months before the wires started popping out. They are inexpensive but not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Great Set of Whisks
customer_reviews.text: Good basic set of whisks. They are sturdy and seem to be well-made. I like that the wires are not flimsy - they work well when mixing thick batters or other mixtures. Mine have all been well-used and run through the dishwasher many times - they still look new. This was one of those 'I got a great product at a cheap price' experiences. :-) Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Andy W.

customer_reviews.title: Fragile Product.
customer_reviews.text: Well, they are whisks, of course, but they can't handle anything stiffer than whipped cream. I tried them on cheese sauce: the loops bent. I tried them on chocolate sauce: the loops bent. Basically, they can't handle basic kitchen whisk chores.
customer_reviews.author: AwfulAmy

customer_reviews.title: Best I have EVER owned
customer_reviews.text: I was absolutely floored by the quality of these whisks. A closer examination of each shows the attention to caring and detail in their design. Best I have EVER owned.
customer_reviews.author: E.S.Oxley

customer_reviews.title: Ok Product
customer_reviews.text: I got these whisk to replace whisk that I've had for many years. the first time I used the small one the wires bent out of shape. I bent it back into place and can still use it but I will be looking for a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Shoddy product made in China
customer_reviews.text: 2 of the 3 whisks broke into pieces in just 3 months of light use at home. These three Amazon Basic products are of very poor quality, poor design, and poorly assembled.
customer_reviews.author: JoseLuis

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable grip
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these for months now and they are great but my favorite one, the middle one is a bit crooked after my kids used it. Either than that I’m really happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy of 3

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Complete garbage. All three broke in less than half a year. I tried to fix them but no go. These weren't used to mix take batters or anything like that just the basics. Complete waste of money
customer_reviews.author: YAKW

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I love these, sturdy, nice, great handles. I bought these because I love the sealed handles where the tines connect, I hate when water gets up there because you can never get it fully out.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: The large one broke the first time I used it ...
customer_reviews.text: The large one broke the first time I used it... The wire can right out of the handle while I was making pancakes.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Are any whisks easy to clean?
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect basic whisks for anyone who just needs a set in their house. 5 stars all around except for cleaning, although that is kinda the design of all whisks. They are all hard to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Edith Mcvey

customer_reviews.title: Basic Whisk set... one for every job!
customer_reviews.text: My 20 year old whisk bit the dust! I had to have a new one so I found this set and It turns out to be a very nice feeling and durable looking set. It cleans up easier than my old whisk too!
customer_reviews.author: Sidney S. Terrell

customer_reviews.title: Worse than expected
customer_reviews.text: Almost immediately after first use the whisk started separating at the handle. It’s not easy to fix or to clean. Apart from that the whisk works as you’d expect.
customer_reviews.author: Bissy&Bram

customer_reviews.title: Almost bought OXO, but I'm glad I went with these...
customer_reviews.text: Almost deciding on the OXO whisk due to some of the negative reviews, but honestly I haven't had any issues at all. Glad I didn't listen cause it saved money and now I have 3 instead of one.
customer_reviews.author: Lino412

customer_reviews.title: One broke before it was even used!
customer_reviews.text: I put the pack of three through the dishwasher and one handle pulled back after going through the wash. It probably doesn't bode well for the durability of these things.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher M Meisinger

customer_reviews.title: Great value for 3 whisks
customer_reviews.text: These 3 whisks are very useful in the kitchen. Three sizes for all types of cooking jobs. Highly recommended. Save money and buy these rather than other more pricey whisks. These are just as good.
customer_reviews.author: Corsair174

customer_reviews.title: These are great. I have been using a heavy whisk for ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I have been using a heavy whisk for years. So glad I purchased these. They are light weight and whisk great.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Medium whisk is very flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: The whisk feel good in the hand, but the wires on the medium whisk bend very easily and do not go back to their normal position. It is not really usable to whisk anything. The small and large are stronger.
customer_reviews.author: M Management

customer_reviews.title: Comes apart
customer_reviews.text: Garbage! All of the pieces in this set have separated at the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Okay I think
customer_reviews.text: Work fine. Just don’t seem very sturdy. Maybe I am too skeptical.
customer_reviews.author: J. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: First Amazon Basics Fail For Me
customer_reviews.text: The handle came off the big one during a rather energetic egg-nog making session.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: These work well. I use the smaller one for icing, and the larger ones for mixing cake and pie batter. They work well.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle J.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I bought theses as a Christmas gift for my husband. Both of us love them. Tossed out our silicone ones because these are far more durable. As with any metal utensil be careful with Teflon or coated cookware.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi J

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality, Nice handle
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my wife for Christmas. She loves them so far. Seems like good quality. Handle most desirable with good grip.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: these are great for the kitchen !!!  I use these all the time - they're perfect :)
customer_reviews.text: these are great for the kitchen !!! I use these all the time - they're perfect :)
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Whip it good
customer_reviews.text: Best set of whisks I have ever owned. Very solid construction, and go through the dishwasher like a champ. These are whisks for serious cooks on a serious budget.
customer_reviews.author: Teacup Squid

customer_reviews.title: NOT DISHWASHER SAFE
customer_reviews.text: im on my second set after the first one went through the dishwasher and the handle came off. amazon sent me a new set for free and guess what happened again... the handle came off again
customer_reviews.author: amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Good item but these are not as sturdy as some others I have used.
customer_reviews.author: John K

customer_reviews.title: Just as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Just as Advertised. Thank you for a great Amazon experience!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick J Walker

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and does its job!
customer_reviews.text: I love the different sizes and super easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jeni5

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I love these whisks, now I always have the right size for the project. The handles are especially nice, soft and easy to hang on to.
customer_reviews.author: FSRGP

product_meta.title: AmazonBasics Stainless Steel Wire Whisk Set - 3-Piece
feature_bullets: 3-piece wire whisk set includes 9-inch, 10-inch, and 11.5-inch sizes
Popular balloon shape for optimal whipping; ideal for everyday use
Comfortably contoured, solid-black handle ensures a secure hold
Backed by an AmazonBasics limited one-year warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars594 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
